item.title: Perioperative Pembro or Enfortumab Vedotin Cleared for MIBC
item.description: New combination extends event-free and overall survival beyond surgery alone in muscle invasive bladder cancer. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Novo Nordisk Spent Millions Driving Searches to Ozempic Site
item.description: The authors say the marketing technique led consumers to company websites, aimed at increasing prescriptions. Medscape Medical News
